channel.title: Ancient magiks spell name editing
channel.description:
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/116taw8.png[/img]
What I'm trying to do is (if you can't infer from the title) edit the spell names as shown above. This is on the DeltaCleaned source and the TextHandler class needs to be edited. Does anyone know a way how to do so?
Thanks in advance. For all of you rep whores, I will rep you if your answer helps!

item.title: Ancient magiks spell name editing
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Could just edit the cache -_- would cause the servr not to “lagg” upon login because you changed these server sided =|

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient magiks spell name editing
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:8, topic:337632”]12863 = Level 58 : Ice Rush
12864 = A single target ice attack

12873 = Level 82 : Ice Blitz
12874 = A single target strong\nice attack

12883 = Level 70 : Ice Burst
12884 = A multi-target ice attack

12893 = Level 94 : Ice Barrage
12894 = A multi-target strong\nice attack

12903 = Level 56 : Blood Rush
12904 = A single target blood attack

12913 = Level 80 : Blood Blitz
12914 = A single target strong\nblood attack

12921 = Level 68 : Blood Burst
12922 = A multi-target blood attack

12931 = Level 92 : Blood Barrage
12932 = A multi-target strong\nblood attack

12941 = Level 50 : Smoke Rush
12942 = A single target smoke attack

12953 = Level 74 : Smoke Blitz
12954 = A single target strong\n smoke attack

12965 = Level 62 : Smoke Burst
12966 = A multi-target smoke attack

12977 = Level 86 : Smoke Barrage
12978 = A multi-target strong\nsmoke attack

12989 = Level 52 : Shadow Rush
12990 = A single target shadow attack

Here you go.[/quote]
Thanks, these look like they would work; I would try when I’m on my other laptop.

Read full topic
